summary: THE DOOR AJAR LIGHT LIGHT WILL COME ON WHILE DRIVING AS THERE WAS NOT LIGHT ON WHEN ONE STARTED THE TRIP BUT COMES ON AFTER DRIVING A BIT, AND HAVE TO SLAM THE DOOR SEVERAL TIMES AND ALSO CAUSE THE INTERIOR LIGHTS TO COME ON.  HAVE TO BE CAREFUL AS SOME TIMES THE LIGHT DOES NOT GO OFF WHEN CAR IS PARKED.  FEEL IT IS A HAZARD TO BE DRIVING AND THE DOOR AJAR LIGHT COME ON AFTER DRIVING A WHILE IN TRAFFIC
